description:

If you are a bottom, you know it can be a challenge to do this, as you are working those quads while working your meat! Not an easy task! But Broderick squirts a crazy good load!
Of course, Palmer gets in the final bit of stuffing by creaming his hole with juicy goodness!
Hope you guys enjoyed the Marathon!
title: Broderick & Palmer - RAW
